title: Corporate Governance Practices of UiPath Inc

content.text: UiPath Inc has a diverse and experienced board of directors. The board consists of individuals with expertise in various fields, including technology, finance, and management. This diverse composition ensures a broad range of perspectives and skills to guide the company's strategic decisions.

UiPath Inc emphasizes the independence of its directors. The majority of the board members are independent, meaning they have no direct affiliation with the company or its executives. This independence helps in ensuring unbiased decision-making and protecting the interests of shareholders.

UiPath Inc has established various board committees to address specific areas of governance. These committees include an Audit Committee, Compensation Committee, and Nominating and Governance Committee. Each committee has its own charter, outlining its responsibilities and powers. This structure allows for focused oversight and specialized expertise in key areas.

UiPath Inc follows a transparent and performance-based executive compensation system. The company sets clear performance objectives and ties a significant portion of executive compensation to the achievement of these objectives. This approach aligns the interests of executives with those of shareholders, promoting long-term value creation.

UiPath Inc provides shareholders with the opportunity to participate in the decision-making process regarding executive compensation through a say-on-pay vote. This allows shareholders to express their opinion on the company's compensation practices and ensures accountability to shareholders.

UiPath Inc allows shareholders to nominate candidates for the board of directors through proxy access. This gives shareholders the ability to have a greater influence on the composition of the board and ensures representation of their interests.

UiPath Inc has a strong commitment to ethical standards and integrity. The company has a code of conduct that outlines expected behavior for all employees, including directors and executives. This code of conduct promotes a culture of integrity and ensures that the company operates with the highest ethical standards.

UiPath Inc actively engages with its shareholders to understand their concerns and gather feedback. The company holds regular shareholder meetings and provides opportunities for shareholders to ask questions and voice their opinions. This engagement strengthens the relationship between the company and its shareholders.

news.headline: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Says AI Software Could Be 11x Bigger Than Nvidia: 2 Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold Long Term
news.summary: Chipmaker Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) is often seen the quintessential artificial intelligence (AI) company because it dominates the market for machine learning processors.  The stock has gained 250% in the past year and Nvidia is now worth $1.2 trillion.  CEO Cathie Wood elaborated during a recent CNBC interview, "For every $1 in hardware that companies spend on artificial intelligence, they will probably pull $20 through in software."

news.summary: Investors appear to have liked the Federal Reserve's latest decision to maintain the benchmark interest rate in the target range of 5.25% to 5.5%.  Further, estimates from the Bureau of Economic Analysis show that the real gross domestic product (GDP) of the U.S. economy increased at a 4.9% annualized rate in the third quarter -- ahead of expected 4.7% growth and the fastest it has grown in the past two years.  With artificial intelligence (AI) now at the helm of the ongoing technological revolution, investors might wish to increase their portfolio exposure to this long-term trend.

news.headline: UiPath Announces Third Quarter Fiscal 2024 Financial Results Conference Call
news.summary: NEW YORK, November 02, 2023--UiPath, Inc. (NYSE: PATH), a leading enterprise automation software company, today announced it will report financial results for its third quarter fiscal 2024 ended October 31, 2023 after the market closes on Thursday, November 30, 2023. Management will host a conference call and webcast to discuss the Company's financial results at 5:00 pm ET.
